projects.title: Maxwell's Game Of Life
projects.description: Another implementation of smooth life. The ruleset in this version is more similar to the more popular versions of smooth life.

projects.title: Maxwells Oscillations
projects.description: Another implementation of the Belousov Zhabotinsky reaction, this time with variable neighbor radii and convolutions!

projects.title: Oscillating Cellular Automata
projects.description: A cellular automata whose rule set is very similar to that of the Belousov Zhabotinsky reaction. The result is far different though.

projects.title: Oscillating Life
projects.description: A cellular automata using a ruleset which combines the ideas present in smooth life and the Belousov-Zhabotinsky reaction. Epilepsy Warning!

projects.title: Virtual Machine
projects.description: A virtual machine running a simple home-brew assembly language.

projects.title: VMC
projects.description: Virtual Machine Code, Assembly, and basic intermediary language. All interpreted and compiled real-time.

projects.title: Belousov-Zhabotinsky Reaction
projects.description: A Belousov-Zhabotinsky reaction simulator. Epilepsy Warning!

projects.title: Code Editor
projects.description: Code Editor and Executor sporting the Monaco editor and Piston code execution engine.

projects.title: WebGL Fractal
projects.description: A Fractal written in WebGL, using my Shader Playground. Code inspired by kishimisu

projects.title: Lisp Interpreter
projects.description: The interactive web variation of eLispsis, which is interpreted and executed in real-time.

projects.title: Smooth Life
projects.description: My take on Smooth Life, Conway's Game of Life but with a different and more complex rule-set
